name: vk-booking-manager
description: Booking and scheduling manager tailored for multi-staff service providers.

scripts.build:free: node bin/switch-resource-config-dev.js free && npm run build
scripts.build:pro: node bin/switch-resource-config-dev.js pro && npm run build
scripts.build:i18n:json: wp i18n make-json languages/vk-booking-manager-ja.po languages --no-purge && node bin/merge-json-translations.js
scripts.phpunit: wp-env run tests-cli --env-cwd='wp-content/plugins/vk-booking-manager-pro' sh -c 'composer install && wp db query "CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS wordpress_test" >/dev/null 2>&1 || true && vendor/bin/phpunit -c phpunit.xml.dist'
scripts.dist:stage:free: mkdir -p dist/vk-booking-manager && rsync -a --delete --exclude='.git' --exclude='.github' --exclude='.vscode' --exclude='bin' --exclude='node_modules' --exclude='dist' --exclude='docs' --exclude='.wordpress-env' --exclude='.idea' --exclude='.DS_Store' --exclude='*.zip' --exclude='vendor' --exclude='readme.md' --exclude='AGENT.md' ./ dist/vk-booking-manager && cd dist/vk-booking-manager && composer install --no-dev --prefer-dist --no-interaction --no-progress --optimize-autoloader && cd ../.. && node bin/switch-resource-config.js free
scripts.dist:stage:pro: mkdir -p dist/vk-booking-manager-pro && rsync -a --delete --exclude='.git' --exclude='.github' --exclude='.vscode' --exclude='bin' --exclude='node_modules' --exclude='dist' --exclude='docs' --exclude='.wordpress-env' --exclude='.idea' --exclude='.DS_Store' --exclude='*.zip' --exclude='vendor' --exclude='tests' --exclude='test' ./ dist/vk-booking-manager-pro && cd dist/vk-booking-manager-pro && composer install --no-dev --prefer-dist --no-interaction --no-progress --optimize-autoloader && cd ../.. && node bin/switch-resource-config.js pro vk-booking-manager-pro
scripts.dist:all: npm run dist:prepare && npm-run-all -s dist:stage:free dist:stage:pro
scripts.dist:free: npm run dist:prepare && npm run dist:stage:free
scripts.dist:pro: npm run dist:prepare && npm run dist:stage:pro
scripts.zip:free: npm run dist:free && npm run zip:free:from-dist
scripts.zip:pro: npm run dist:pro && npm run zip:pro:from-dist
scripts.zip:free:from-dist: cd dist && rm -f vk-booking-manager.zip && zip -qr vk-booking-manager.zip vk-booking-manager
scripts.zip:free:release:from-dist: cd dist && rm -f vk-booking-manager.zip && zip -qr vk-booking-manager.zip vk-booking-manager -x "vk-booking-manager/.wp-env.json" "vk-booking-manager/phpunit.xml.dist" "vk-booking-manager/tests/*" "vk-booking-manager/tests/*/*" "vk-booking-manager/tests/*/*/*" "vk-booking-manager/test/*" "vk-booking-manager/test/*/*" "vk-booking-manager/test/*/*/*" "vk-booking-manager/composer.lock" "vk-booking-manager/package.json" "vk-booking-manager/package-lock.json" "vk-booking-manager/docs/*" "vk-booking-manager/docs/*/*" "vk-booking-manager/docs/*/*/*" "vk-booking-manager/.github/*" "vk-booking-manager/.github/*/*" "vk-booking-manager/.github/*/*/*" "vk-booking-manager/.gitignore"
scripts.zip:pro:from-dist: cd dist && rm -f vk-booking-manager-pro.zip && zip -qr vk-booking-manager-pro.zip vk-booking-manager-pro -x "vk-booking-manager-pro/.gitignore"
scripts.zip:all: npm run dist:all && npm-run-all -s zip:free:from-dist zip:pro:from-dist
